content.question: Which of the following is the best interpretation of the statement <math alttext="W prime of 2, is greater than 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>â€²</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: Two hours after the tank begins filling with water, the depth of the water is increasing at a rate greater than <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> feet per hour.

Over the first two hours after the tank begins filling with water, the depth of the water is always increasing at a rate greater than <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> feet per hour.

Two hours after the tank begins filling with water, the rate at which the depth of the water is rising is increasing at a rate greater than <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> feet per hour per hour.

Over the first two hours after the tank begins filling with water, the rate at which the depth of the water is rising is always increasing at a rate greater than <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> feet per hour per hour.

content.answer: Two hours after the tank begins filling with water, the rate at which the depth of the water is rising is increasing at a rate greater than <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> feet per hour per hour.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
